definition: down to the smallest detail/thoroughgoing/fine and detailed
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]
surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
to show every possible consideration (idiom); meticulous care
to emphasize down to last detail (idiom); to show every possible consideration/meticulous care

sentences.english: Yes , yes, " said the Acting Dean gently."
sentences.chinese: “不錯，不錯，”代理院長體貼入微地說。

sentences.english: Wholehearted service makes you felt delicate considerateness and care.
sentences.chinese: 全身心的服務使您感受到入微的體貼與關懷。

sentences.english: He is always considerate to old people.
sentences.chinese: 他對老人一向體貼入微。

sentences.english: He was carefully nursed by his wife .
sentences.chinese: 他的妻子體貼入微地照顧他。

sentences.english: Activities washing can lead to design considerate, flexible and practical.
sentences.chinese: 可活動洗滌龍頭，設計體貼入微，靈活實用。

sentences.english: He recovered soon under his wife's tender loving care.
sentences.chinese: 在妻子體貼入微的關懷下，他很快就痊癒了。

sentences.english: John showed great consideration for Janet.
sentences.chinese: 約翰對珍妮特體貼入微。

sentences.english: Analysts tend to view things as more nuanced.
sentences.chinese: 心理分析師細微入微得看待事物。

sentences.english: They are the most detailed embryonic animal pictures ever seen.
sentences.chinese: 這些照片也許是最細緻入微的動物胚胎寫真了。

sentences.english: The figures, meticulously depicted, all look composed.
sentences.chinese: 人物形態安詳，刻畫入微。

sentences.english: Obsessions of a Pop Culture Nerd: Pitt “gives a nice, subtle performance full of wonder and longing.”
sentences.chinese: 皮特“表演細膩入微，充滿憧憬和奇蹟，令人愉悅。”

sentences.english: Keen observation is the key to winning this game.
sentences.chinese: 觀察入微是贏得這場遊戲的不二法門。

sentences.english: That nurse cared for the patient as tenderly as she did her own daughter .
sentences.chinese: 那位護士像照顧自己的女兒一樣體貼入微地照顧患者。

sentences.english: Honest to people, focus in detail, committed promise, continuous improvement.
sentences.chinese: 待人真誠，細緻入微，守信重諾，持續改善。

sentences.english: Note person than before, Yang Lun's comments even more attentive.
sentences.chinese: 較之前人之注，楊倫的註解更加體貼入微。

definition: to reach perfection (idiom); a superb artistic achievement
masterly/subtle and clever (or artwork, writing etc)
exquisite/fine and delicate (usu. of works of art)
lit. spirit and marrow/the essential character
very close/no gap between them/continuously/unbroken/hard to separate/indistinguishable
